trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE > Microdata
Type of current containing item
This field displays the type of the item within the scope of which the current element resides, if any.
If a type of item is displayed, then the current element may be assigned a property of that type of item.
The Microdata feature allows to edit microdata attributes of elements in the RTE editing area.
trans-unit.target: Die Microdata-Funktion erlaubt es, Microdata-Attribute von Elementen im RTE zu bearbeiten.

trans-unit.source:
When this feature is enabled, the dialogue opened when clicking the "Edit element" button in the editor toolbar allows to edit the microdata attributes of the current element in the RTE editing area. Another button allows to make visible all microdata in the editing area.
By default, this features uses the microdata dictionary defined by schema.org (http://schema.org). However, it may be configured to use other dictionaries.
EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/EditElement/skin/images/element-edit.png, EXT:rtehtmlarea/Resources/Public/Images/Plugins/MicrodataSchema/microdata-show.gif
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.
This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: "Edit element" icon. When the cursor is inside an element, clicking it opens a dialogue that allows to edit the microdata attributes of the element. "Show microdata" icon. Clicking it shows or hides all microdata items in the editing area.
Item property
Select the item property associated to the current element.
The properties displayed in this selector box are those of the type of the current containing item.
Item scope
Check/uncheck this checkbox in order to set or unset this element as an item.
If the checkbox is checked, then the current element is identified as an item and should be assigned a type.
Item type
Select the type of item to be assigned to the current element.
trans-unit.target: W채hlen Sie den Elementtyp, den Sie der aktuellen Auswahl zuweisen wollen.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_MicrodataSchema:Show_microdata, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_MicrodataSchema:currentItemType, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_MicrodataSchema:itemscope, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_MicrodataSchema:itemtype, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_MicrodataSchema:itemprop
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.
This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Show microdata
Show/hide all microdata items in the editing area..

Clicking the "Show microdata" button makes all microdata items in the editing area visible or, if they are currently visible, the button being highlighted as active, hides these items. The type or the property of each item is shown in small capital letters in front of the element providing the microdata value. This applies only when editing content and has no effect when the element is rendered in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Anklicken der Schaltfl채che "Microdata anzeigen" macht alle Microdata-Elemente zur Bearbeitung sichtbar oder, wenn sie aktuell sichtbar sind und die Schaltfl채che als aktiv markiert ist, unsichtbar. Der Typ oder die Eigenschaft jedes Elements wird in Kleinbuchstaben vor dem Element angezeigt, das den Microdata-Wert bereitstellt. Das gilt nur w채hrend des Bearbeitens von Inhalten und hat keine Auswirkungen auf die Ausgabe im Frontend.
